definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: That's what people are going to say.
sentences.chinese: 你說的就像瘋話，外邊的人都會這麼說的。

sentences.english: Don't talk such nonsense, how can a good-for-nothing like you make a million?
sentences.chinese: 別說瘋話了，就憑你這本事，怎麼能賺到一百萬呢？

sentences.english: I've heard enought of you garbage.
It sounds crazy, but I believe it anyhow.
sentences.chinese: 它聽起來像瘋話，然而我信賴。

sentences.english: To a European, this is madness.
sentences.chinese: 對一個歐洲人而言，這簡直是瘋話。
